Phobia listened to Magmatrons ravings."He's insane, This ship has the 
power to wipe him out without using it's main guns" The spider now 
thought about the logic."Magmatron has followers, where are they?"

Phobia thought of the possibilities and decided that this must be a 
show for his benefit. but why Magmatron would commit suicide he 
didn't knoe. The spiderbot decided not to worry about it and enjoy 
the show.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> OOC: Magmatron is still in the Destron base, he's talking to the 
Destrocons 
> right now. Earth made a simple mistake, he skimmed through my mail. 
I don't 
> mind that he returned to base, but he is not in control, yet.
> 
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Your services are welcome here Destrocons. I will allow you to 
choose 
> your quarters. They are down that hall and to the right." Magmatron 
said.
>     "Now for Bobertron." He said as he saw them. "Greeting 
Bobertron. I am 
> glad to see that you have returned to base. I will be away for a 
little while 
> and I wish for you to run the base. There is an encoded message for 
you in 
> the event of my death. It will only be accessed if I am offline for 
good. 
> Good luck in running the Destrons."
>     He took his leave. Transforming to Beast Mode he flew to the 
Iron Fist. 
> He transformed to Robot mode. He starts to bring about a main 
weapon. An 
> energy blast. It would no way destroy the ship, or even dent it, 
but it would 
> serve his purposes.
>     "Iron Fist, I can destroy the ship. And I will destroy it if 
you don't 
> surrender utterly to me." Magmatron said. He knew that a bug was on 
him, he 
> also knew that it might help him.
